item.title: Blocked Refuse Chute – 5th Floor, Woodsford Building, 22nd December
item.description:
Subject Blocked Refuse Chute – 5th Floor, Woodsford Building Portland Street London Dear Southwark Housing Management, Could you please arrange for someone to unblock the refuse chute on the 5th floor of Woodsford Building? Thank you for your assistance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Portland Street, Walworth, Greater London

item.title: Several Potholes on both sides of the road., 22nd December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Totteridge Lane, Whetstone, Greater London

item.title: Extremely large and deep pothole, 22nd December
item.description:
The pothole is at least 1m diameter and 50cm deep with road debris from the tarmac all over the road. It is on the stretch of Friary Road after Friary Way near the brook in the direction towards Friern Barnet Lane. There are several potholes on Friary Road between Friary Way and Friern Barnet Lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Friary Road, North Finchley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hassett Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Old wet decomposed leaves, 22nd December
item.description:
Main road SIDCUP As you come out of the crescent to the right the road is covered with old decomposing leaves. They are stuck in the path They are covering the path and are very slippery. Can they be removed please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Light not working on alley between Letchworth Close and Beadon Road, 22nd December
item.description:
The light in the middle of the alley is not working, making the alley dark and dangerous at night. The leds are on very dimly, not enough to provide any real light.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Beadon Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 street lights on 27/7 for last 3 weeks, 22nd December

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bidborough Close, Hayes, Greater London
